title: H5P Interactive Book Utilization Strategies for Nursing Simulation Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic nursing theory and clinical practice procedures
context.additional_context: Learners progress through simulation-based learning in an asynchronous environment using personal devices, periodically monitoring learning outcomes through formative assessment

learning_goals: Can select appropriate nursing interventions in patient simulation scenarios using H5P interactive books with over 80% accuracy.
Can correct clinical judgment errors within three attempts via feedback systems in interactive content.
Can achieve over 75% collaboration efficiency when performing team-based nursing procedures in digital simulation environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
